name: Backup Snippets – Restore Code Snippet Easily
author: Fuad Hadi Nugroho

sections.description:
Backup Snippet is a safe way to create a copy of your code in Code Snippet.

Don’t lose your code, even if it’s just one line.

Dependencies

This plugin is an unofficial addition of Code Snippets. You must first install the Code Snippets plugin.

Please visit the link below to get the Code Snippets plugin.

https://wordpress.org/plugins/code-snippets/

Plugin Features

Auto Generate

Our plugin will generate your code history automatically.

History

You can view code history and restore it with easily (Copy/Paste).
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • Code Snippets 3.3.0 or greater is recommended
  • PHP 8.1.11 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL 5.7 or greater is recommended

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option — WordPress will handle the file transfer, and you won‚Äôt need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Backup Snippets, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click ‚ÄúAdd New.‚Äù

In the search field type ‚ÄúBackup Snippets‚Äù, then click ‚ÄúSearch Plugins.‚Äù Once you‚Äôve found us, you can view details about it such as the point release, rating, and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by! Click ‚ÄúInstall Now,‚Äù and WordPress will take it from there.

Manual installation

Manual installation method requires downloading the Backup Snippets plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
How much do I have to pay to get this plugin?

It’s FREE. For now you don’t have to pay a penny and enjoy our services.
